title: Playback start latency: 500ms
description: Event 'playback_start' fired at t=9500ms, but video motion detected at t=9000ms. Expected latency 0-100ms; observed 500ms early event vs. observation. Likely due to event batching or early firing before decoder ready.

title: Ad skip button not detected
description: Event 'ad_end' at t=126000ms but OCR still showed 'skip ad' text until t=129000ms. Ad ended in telemetry but UI didn't update immediately. 3-second discrepancy.
